meanings.definition: Houseflies: small flying insects commonly found in homes
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of houseflies near the window.
meanings.sent3: The houseflies were having a party on the fruit bowl.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with houseflies, like tiny dancers in the air.
meanings.sent5: The annoying houseflies kept landing on the food.

meanings.definition: Houseflies: plural form of housefly, referring to multiple insects of the same species
meanings.sent1: Look at all the houseflies on the wall!
meanings.sent2: Houseflies can be a nuisance during the summer.
meanings.sent3: The houseflies seemed to be having a meeting on the ceiling.
meanings.sent4: The field was covered in houseflies, like a moving carpet.
meanings.sent5: The houseflies in the garden were attracted to the ripe fruits.

meanings.definition: Houseflies: to describe the presence of houseflies in a particular location
meanings.sent1: The smell in the kitchen houseflies with it.
meanings.sent2: During summer, houseflies often in our house.
meanings.sent3: The picnic houseflies with laughter and joy.
meanings.sent4: The excitement of the game houseflies in the air.
meanings.sent5: The music at the party houseflies everyone to the dance floor.
